item.description:
Learn about the 9 Enneagram types with Herb acting out each type with hats and a song for each type. You'll discover your type, important people in your life, and how to relate to each type.

Option to end between 9:30-10pm.

Herb Pearce is taught more Enneagram workshops than just about anyone on the planet. He is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram and Herb's Tips for Living (both books available from Herb. As a therapist and personal coach and personality types trainer in organizations, he has worked with many thousands of people using this system.

Cost $40 - Sliding scale from $40-20 based on ability to pay

www.herbpearce.com
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, Corner of Tanager St. and Wollaston Ave.
item.name: Enneagram Basic Workshop
